Title: Prohibits banning the burning of wood, coal, natural gas, propane, or other fuels for the purposes of cooking or otherwise preparing food
Summary: Prohibits banning the burning of wood, coal, natural gas, propane, or other fuels for the purposes of cooking or otherwise preparing food.
LawCode: Amd ยง75-0109, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the burning of wood, coal, natural gas, propane, or other fuels for the purposes of cooking or otherwise preparing food
